import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RequestForm } from '../requestForm'; import { StudentAlumniService } from '../studAlum.service'; import { MdbModalRef , MdbModalService } from 'mdb-angular-ui-kit/modal'; @Component({ selector: 'app-postloginalumni', templateUrl: './postloginalumni.component.html', styleUrls: ['./postloginalumni.component.css'] }) export class PostloginalumniComponent implements OnInit { public requestFormData!: any; constructor(private studentAlumniService:StudentAlumniService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.studentAlumniService.getAllRecords().subscribe(res =>{ console.log("records" , res); this.requestFormData = res; }) } displayStyle = "none"; tempRecordModal : any = null; openPopup(record:any) { this.tempRecordModal = record; console.log(record ) this.displayStyle = "block"; } closePopup() { this.displayStyle = "none"; } }
